Doc: The environmental physical leg describes the nature of the physical underlying, quantities and delivery conditions relating to environmental allowances and certificates such as EU emissions allowances, water pollution credits and the like.

Source.Contents:
/#
   The environmental physical leg describes the nature of the physical underlying, quantities and delivery conditions relating to environmental allowances and certificates such as EU emissions allowances, water pollution credits and the like.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.EnvironmentalPhysicalLeg {
  # A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerPartyReference : FpML5.confirmation.PartyReference

  # A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerAccountReference : FpML5.confirmation.AccountReference?

  # A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverPartyReference : FpML5.confirmation.PartyReference

  # A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverAccountReference : FpML5.confirmation.AccountReference?

  # The number of allowances, certificates or credit to be transaction in the transaction.
  numberOfAllowances : FpML5.confirmation.UnitQuantity

  # The specification of the type of allowance or credit.
  environmental : FpML5.confirmation.EnvironmentalProduct

  # Applies to U.S. Emissions Allowance Transactions. Specifies terms which apply in the event of an Abandonment of Scheme event.
  abandonmentOfScheme : string?

  # The date on which allowances are to be delivered as specified in the related Confirmation.
  deliveryDate : FpML5.confirmation.AdjustableOrRelativeDate

  paymentDate : FpML5.confirmation.DateOffset

  # A pointer style reference to a set of financial business centers defined elsewhere in the document. This set of business centers is used to determine whether a particular day is a business day or not.
  businessCentersReference : FpML5.confirmation.BusinessCentersReference

  businessCenters : FpML5.confirmation.BusinessCenters

  # Applies to EU Emissions Allowance Transactions. Holds the Failure to Deliver (Alternative Method) election. Used to determine how provisions in Part [7] Page 7 (B) Failure to Deliver Not Remedied are to be applied.
  failureToDeliverApplicable : boolean?

  # Applies to EU Emissions Allowance Transactions. Contains a series of parameters controlling Excess Emissions Penalty payments.
  eEPParameters : FpML5.confirmation.EEPParameters?

  id : string?

}

payerPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerPartyReference.Name: payerPartyReference

payerAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerAccountReference.Name: payerAccountReference

receiverPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverPartyReference.Name: receiverPartyReference

receiverAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverAccountReference.Name: receiverAccountReference

numberOfAllowances.Doc: The number of allowances, certificates or credit to be transaction in the transaction.
numberOfAllowances.Name: numberOfAllowances

environmental.Doc: The specification of the type of allowance or credit.
environmental.Name: environmental

abandonmentOfScheme.Doc: Applies to U.S. Emissions Allowance Transactions. Specifies terms which apply in the event of an Abandonment of Scheme event.
abandonmentOfScheme.Name: abandonmentOfScheme

deliveryDate.Doc: The date on which allowances are to be delivered as specified in the related Confirmation.
deliveryDate.Name: deliveryDate

businessCentersReference.Doc: A pointer style reference to a set of financial business centers defined elsewhere in the document. This set of business centers is used to determine whether a particular day is a business day or not.
businessCentersReference.Name: businessCentersReference

failureToDeliverApplicable.Doc: Applies to EU Emissions Allowance Transactions. Holds the Failure to Deliver (Alternative Method) election. Used to determine how provisions in Part [7] Page 7 (B) Failure to Deliver Not Remedied are to be applied.
failureToDeliverApplicable.Name: failureToDeliverApplicable

eEPParameters.Doc: Applies to EU Emissions Allowance Transactions. Contains a series of parameters controlling Excess Emissions Penalty payments.
eEPParameters.Name: eEPParameters
